question: The group reagent <katex>$NH_{4}Cl(s)$</katex> and aqueous <katex>$NH_{3}$</katex> will precipitate which of the following ion?
explanation: Group III cations (<katex>$Al^{3+}, Fe^{3+}, Cr^{3+}$</katex>) are precipitated as hydroxides by <katex>$NH_4OH$</katex> in the presence of <katex>$NH_4Cl$</katex>.
